page.title: 15LOCAL RECREATION
page.content: WE CONDUCTED A SURVEY ON LEISURE AND SPORTS.THE SURVEY WAS OUT OF 15O PEOPLE OF ALL AGES.THERE WERE MANY DIFFERENT ACTIVITIES RANGING FROM KNITTING TO OUTDOOR PURSUITS.SPORTS WERE THE FAVOURITE RECREATIONAL ACTIVITY FOLLOWED BY PASTIMES.FAVOURITE SPORT WAS RACQUET GAMES E.G. TENNIS.THE MOST POPULAR PLACE FOR SPORT WAS THE BLACK LION CENTRE FOLLOWED BY THE ANCHORIANS CLUB.FOOTBALL IS ONE OF THE MOST POPULAR SPORTS BECAUSE THERE ARE MANY LEAGUES LOCALLY. THE MEDWAY CITY BOYS LEAGUE HAS AGE GROUPS RANGING FROM THE UNDER 10'S TO THE ADULTS .THERE ARE MANY YOUTH CLUBS IN THE AREA E.G. THE HOWARD SCHOOL YOUTH CLUB. THIS STARTS FROM THE THIRD YEARS UPWARDS. IN THE YOUTH CLUB THEY PLAY TABLETENNIS,FOOTB ALL,BADMINTON AND LOTS OF OTHER SPORTS, AND A DISCO FOR UPPER YEARS.
